---
title: "Metagenomics & Bioinformatics"
format: html
---

This research investigates the microbial communities associated with corn plants using metagenomic sequencing and bioinformatics analysis. Key focus areas include:

- Utilizing metagenomic sequencing methods to profile microbial diversity.
- Analyzing sequencing data with advanced bioinformatics pipelines.
- Interpreting the implications of microbial community dynamics on plant health.

For more on metagenomics techniques, check out the resources provided by the [National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/) :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}.
